Unlike other addon's this uses the Hub Traffic JSON API's to retrieve video's from the Porn Hub network of sites: [COLOR yellow]PornHub[/COLOR], [COLOR pink]Spankwire[/COLOR], [COLOR green]Tube8[/COLOR], [COLOR blue]GayTube[/COLOR], [COLOR orange]XTube[/COLOR], [COLOR red]RedTube[/COLOR], and [COLOR purple]YouPorn[/COLOR]. [COLOR red][B]WARNING:[/B] Only for adults[/COLOR] [B]0.6.0[/B]: Minor Bug Fixes, Additional attempts to resolve video's on website using slightly modified Livestreamer ex RunPlugin(plugin://plugin.video.livestreamerkodi/play/http...)
